fields.name: Chain Mail
fields.description: A suit of interlocking metal rings, providing good protection without hindering mobility.

fields.name: Shield
fields.description: A piece of wood or metal held in the hand or attached to the arm, used to block attacks.

fields.name: Holy Symbol
fields.description: A representation of a deity or religious symbol, used by paladins to focus their divine powers.

fields.name: Arcane Focus
fields.description: A crystal, orb, rod, staff, or wand used by spellcasters to channel their magical energy.

fields.name: Spellbook
fields.description: A book containing a spellcaster's collection of spells, used to prepare and cast spells.

fields.name: Pearl of Power
fields.description: A small, enchanted pearl that can restore expended spell slots to a spellcaster.
